bwwExcerpt: Is this audience engagement at its corniest? Is it blatantly catering to a Broadway demographic? Are the Estefans, who are producers of this show about them, executing another strategy for crossover appeal, this time in the theater world? Maybe, but it will work. On Your Feet is as much by-the-numbers as any other Broadway bio or juke box musical, but when the numbers are "1-2-3" -- the name of one of Estefan's many electrifying hits -- the average theatergoer will surely find it easier to forgi
